wikipedia_page.main: David Landsman  (born 23 August 1963) is a British former diplomat and businessman, currently serving as the Director of Tata Limited; his last diplomatic position was Ambassador to Greece.

response: * David Landsman OBE, Ambassador to Greece since 2009, and to Albania from 2001-3
